title: Testing, 1, 2, 3...
body:
Today we are testing things because this is *reall*y just another board, but with red posting and such.

Hello, World.

replies.body:
Happy now? :(

(Tried creating a thread btw, it failed, but without error message.)
No player created threads here bruh.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pwyff,realm=NA,application-id=NajuAblV,discussion-id=Mz47lMi5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-27T18:29:43.900+0000)
>
> Get out of my corner!!!

Your corner?

Wow Pwyff, I didn't think you had such an...."interesting" side job...
Rioter bullying people on the official forums, reported for toxicity. :O
What's so special about this board huh??????
I'd assume a place for devs to post more dev related devness right?

> [{quoted}](name=Sharjo,realm=EUW,application-id=NajuAblV,discussion-id=Mz47lMi5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-10-27T23:24:15.720+0000)
>
> I'd assume a place for devs to post more dev related devness right?

Devinately
I'm going to need to figure out a way to moderate this thing without driving myself crazy.

Get help from the volunteers?

Or create different modding tools, in either case as long as people use the reporting feature here, there shouldn't be much difference.
Oh cool devs.  Hi Devs!   I'm also a developer, I just work for Oracle not Riot.  Can I still hang out here? :-P
Oh my god, this would be great to have! Red tracker is nice and all, but...eh
That's not what this is. This is where reds will post a topic for discussion and we will... discuss it!
